full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=============================

### Title and Reference

**Tender Title:** TBS Web Building Platform
**Reference Number:** cb-370-49759764
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 24062-24-063-001

### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** March 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 2, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date:** March 22, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2026

### Tender Status

The tender has expired.

### Tender Category

* **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria

* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Trade Agreements

This tender is open to suppliers from Canada under the following Free Trade Agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions and Locations

* **Regions of Opportunity:** Ottawa
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contractor Information

The contracting entity is the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat.
Address:
90 Elgin Street
Ottawa, ON K1A 0R5
Canada

Contact Person:
Dawn Dormer
Phone: (343) 542-8102
Email: dawn.dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca

### Attachments

The tender notice is available for download on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website.

* Amendment 2 to the Request for Proposal (RFP)
* RFP Document (English)
* RFP Document (French)
* Questions and Answers Series 1
* Questions and Answers Series 2 (English)
* Questions and Answers Series 2 (French) . Here is the output of this problem in the correct format you requested with all empty entries removed and some minor changes to improve readability.
MICROPYTHON PROJECT COM
